text:
Hi all!
I am following this guide: <https://www.kelp.agency/blog/simple-hubdb-pagination/> to do a (not so) simple *HubDB pagination*, and it is actually working as expected but I want to load the next "pages" with Ajax so the page is not reloading.
I am trying to do this inside of a module using the `module.js` file but the content of my HubDB is not loading and, actually the webpage crash.
Can someone help me giving me some hint about how to load HubDB content using pure javascript, please?
Thanks!
